A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Risky and excellent film of Star Wars? Definitely yes. There is an excellent acting\, visual\, moral and a lot of memorizing scenes. Strange moments are present\, but they fade in comparison with everything else. If you consider this film to be the worst of all\, then you will get movies in the style of marvel\, which everyone likes. \"Fear is the path to the dark side...fear leads to anger...anger leads to hate...hate leads to suffering\" - Yoda (c)
